title: Can't open Microsoft Word
description: Whenever I try to launch Word, it just flashes and closes immediately. I haven’t changed anything recently.

title: Outlook keeps asking for my password
description: Every time I open Outlook, it keeps prompting me to enter my password even though I checked 'remember me'.

title: VPN not connecting
description: I can’t connect to the VPN on my laptop. It just says 'connection failed' with no other error message.

title: Microsoft Teams keeps crashing
description: Teams opens for a few seconds then freezes and crashes. I already reinstalled it once.

title: Getting error when saving Excel file
description: When I try to save my spreadsheet, Excel says 'Document not saved'. I’m working on a shared drive.

title: My app won’t stop updating
description: Adobe Reader keeps showing 'installing updates' every time I open it. It never finishes.

title: Software update broke my app
description: After updating to the latest version, my finance tool no longer opens. It worked fine yesterday.

title: Spell check not working in Word
description: I typed a few pages and nothing is underlined even though I’m sure there are typos. I checked settings but couldn’t fix it.

title: Can’t install the new version of Chrome
description: I get an error when trying to update Chrome. Something about missing permissions.

title: Slack isn’t loading any messages
description: Slack opens but just shows a spinning icon. I can’t see or send anything.

title: Can’t export report from our CRM
description: When I try to export my weekly report, I get a '504 timeout' error. It worked last week.

title: My screen recording software crashes
description: I use OBS to record training sessions but now it crashes on launch with some DirectX error.

title: Zoom doesn’t detect my camera
description: Zoom says there's no camera found, but it works fine in other apps like Teams.

title: Access denied to internal system
description: I tried logging into our inventory system and it says 'access denied'. I had access last week.

title: Outlook rules not working
description: I created some inbox rules to move emails but none of them are running. I’ve tried restarting Outlook.

title: Can’t open PDFs in browser anymore
description: PDFs used to open in Chrome but now they just download instead. I didn’t change anything.

title: License key not accepted
description: I tried entering the new license key for our data tool but it says 'invalid key format'. I copied it exactly.

title: Software install stuck at 0%
description: Trying to install the accounting app, but it just sits at 0% and never starts.

title: Getting Java errors in business app
description: I’m getting a Java exception when launching our project management tool. Not sure what it means.

title: Can’t log in to payroll system
description: My login for the payroll portal isn’t working, even though I’m using the correct username and password.

title: Clipboard not working in remote desktop
description: I can't copy and paste between my local machine and the remote desktop session anymore.

title: Visual Studio won’t build project
description: I get a build error in Visual Studio even though the code hasn’t changed. It worked yesterday.

title: Error code 0x80070005 during update
description: Trying to update my laptop and I keep getting error 0x80070005. I have plenty of space.

title: Cannot print from Chrome
description: When I try to print anything from Chrome, it crashes. Printing from Word works fine.

title: Autocorrect turning off randomly
description: Autocorrect in Word turns off on its own after a while. I have to keep re-enabling it.

title: Spell check language is wrong
description: Word is checking everything in French even though I want English. I tried changing the language but it reverts.

title: Can’t save changes in Excel
description: I made edits to a shared spreadsheet but get an error when saving. Something about 'locked for editing'.

title: Screen sharing not working in Teams
description: When I click share screen in Teams, nothing happens. I've already restarted the app.

title: Form submission errors in SharePoint
description: Trying to submit a form on our SharePoint site but it keeps saying 'required fields missing' even when they’re filled.

title: Password manager extension is gone
description: My password manager Chrome extension disappeared after a reboot. I didn’t uninstall anything.

title: Google Drive won’t sync
description: Files I upload to Google Drive aren’t syncing to my desktop folder. It says 'sync paused' but won’t resume.

title: Search function broken in Outlook
description: I can't search for old emails in Outlook. The search bar says 'results may be incomplete'.

title: Getting 'app not responding' in Slack
description: Slack stops responding every time I try to join a call. It’s fine for chatting though.

title: Microsoft Store won’t open
description: I need to download something from the Microsoft Store but it won’t open at all.

title: Teams keeps signing me out
description: I have to log back into Teams every time I reboot. It used to stay logged in.

title: Zoom background blur not available
description: I can’t enable the background blur in Zoom. It says my system doesn’t support it but it worked last week.

title: No sound during Teams calls
description: I can’t hear anything in Teams calls, even though my speakers work fine in other apps.

title: Shortcut icons disappeared from desktop
description: All my app shortcuts vanished from my desktop after the last update. I didn’t delete anything.

title: Gmail shows wrong timezone
description: Emails are timestamped hours off. I checked my PC time and it’s correct, so not sure what’s going on.

title: Adobe PDF export not working
description: When I try to export a Word file as PDF using Adobe, it says 'conversion failed'.

title: Toolbar missing in Excel
description: My Excel toolbar disappeared and I can’t get it back. Tried right-clicking but nothing worked.

title: Random popups from an unknown app
description: Every few hours I get a popup saying 'Setup.exe wants to make changes'. I don’t know what app it is.

title: Google Calendar not syncing with Outlook
description: My events in Google Calendar aren’t showing up in Outlook anymore. It used to sync both ways.

title: Autocomplete suggestions missing in Excel
description: Excel used to auto-suggest values I typed before, but that feature just stopped working.

title: App keeps resetting to default settings
description: Every time I open our reporting tool, it goes back to default view. I save my settings but they don’t stick.

title: Can’t paste images into Word
description: I copied an image from the web but Word won’t let me paste it. It just pastes blank space.

title: Receiving duplicate notifications from Teams
description: I get every Teams notification twice. It's really distracting and I don’t know why it’s happening.

title: Zoom keeps defaulting to wrong mic
description: Every time I start a Zoom call, it uses the wrong mic. I change it, but next call it resets again.

title: Online forms not saving progress
description: The compliance training forms don’t save my answers. When I return later, it’s like I never started.
